mapper.select: SELECT id, name, status, address AS address, owner_name AS ownerName, owner_phone AS ownerPhone, city_code AS cityCode FROM WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( name, status, address, owner_name, owner_phone, city_code, create_date, creator, updater ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{status}, #{address}, #{ownerName}, #{ownerPhone}, #{cityCode}, #{createDate}, #{creator}, #{updater} )
